Welcome to frbpoppy’s documentation!¶

Contents:

Code for creating a population of FRBs

class log.Log(save=True, verbose=False, quiet=False, loc=None)¶

Class for logging in- and output in a variety of styles. Only really helpful if calling as such logger = Log().logger() and then using e.g. logger.info('Something moderately important')

Parameters:
  • save (boolean) – Log to file
  • verbose (boolean) – Give more output in console
  • quiet (boolean) – Stop console output
  • loc (str) – Give the log’s filename
logger()¶

Return logger instance (see argparse library)
